seo.title: Joseph House: Reentry Home for Ex-Offenders - Brewww Studio
seo.description: Discover how Joseph House's website was transformed to support their mission of restoring lives and breaking the cycle of mass incarceration.

sections.title: Overcoming Stigma, Restoring Lives
sections.content: Joseph House, a start-up ministry formed in 2019, faced the challenge of creating awareness for their mission to help formerly incarcerated individuals rebuild their lives. They needed to overcome negative perceptions and showcase their work without relying on imagery of the prison system.

sections.title: Key Insight
sections.content: By focusing on restoration and community rather than incarceration, we could shift the narrative from punishment to rehabilitation, appealing to a wider audience and fostering support for Joseph House's mission.

sections.title: Our Strategy
sections.content: We aimed to create a website that emphasizes hope, community, and transformation. Our approach focused on highlighting success stories, explaining the reentry process, and providing clear ways for visitors to support the cause, all while avoiding stereotypical prison imagery.

sections.title: Solution at a Glance
sections.content: We designed a warm, inviting website that effectively communicates Joseph House's mission and impact. The site features compelling narratives, clear statistics, and engaging visuals that focus on restoration and community.
highlights: Emphasis on hope and transformation through storytelling
Clear presentation of the reentry process and its challenges
Engaging visuals that focus on community and support
Easy-to-use donation and volunteer sign-up features
